author: senh
title: A love letter to London’s 139 bus, from an adoring day tripper
text: BING NEWS: A love letter to London’s 139 bus, from an adoring day tripper I have loved many buses. The one I loved most was the Catbus from the Japanese anime film “My Neighbor Totoro,” which, sadly, I have never had the pleasure of encountering in real life. Transport for London’s Route 139 is a close second.
